thread.title: Fuel your inner F1 geek with Aston Martin's Vantage Red Bull Racing Edition - Roadshow
thread.title_full: Fuel your inner F1 geek with Aston Martin's Vantage Red Bull Racing Edition - Roadshow

title: Fuel your inner F1 geek with Aston Martin's Vantage Red Bull Racing Edition - Roadshow

organizations.name: aston martin's vantage red bull racing edition - roadshow
aston martin  one of red bull racing

text:
1 of 21 Fuel your inner F1 geek with Aston Martin's Vantage Red Bull Racing Edition 
If you've ever wanted an Aston Martin that sort of resembles a Formula 1 car, here you go. Photo by: Aston Martin 
This is the Aston Martin Vantage S Red Bull Racing Edition. Photo by: Aston Martin 
Packing a V8 or V12 engine, it offers a number of special motorsport touches. Photo by: Aston Martin 
It can be ordered in blue or matte blue, to resemble Red Bull's F1 car, and also silver, which makes it look like a Red Bull can. Photo by: Aston Martin 
A red grille insert and yellow brake calipers complete the whole Red Bull Racing aesthetic. Photo by: Aston Martin 
There's also a carbon fiber splitter, diffuser and side strakes, to keep things looking nice and sporty. Photo by: Aston Martin 
On the inside, there's Red Bull Racing embroidery on the headrests, carbon fiber trim all over the place, diamond quilted leather and an Alcantara suede steering wheel with an accent stripe at the 12 o'clock position. Photo by: Aston Martin 
One of Red Bull Racing's two F1 drivers -- Daniel Ricciardo and Max Verstappen -- will sign the vehicle's sill and inspection plaques, if the owner so chooses. Photo by: Aston Martin 
The customizations are made possible by Aston Martin's in-house personalization department, Q by Aston Martin. Photo by: Aston Martin 
The Vantage S Red Bull Racing Edition will go on sale in the second quarter of 2017. Photo by: Aston Martin
